setEffects.4: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

flower.name: Summer Night's Bloom
flower.desc: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

plume.name: Summer Night's Finale
plume.desc: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

sands.name: Summer Night's Moment
sands.desc: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

goblet.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
goblet.desc: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

circlet.name: Summer Night's Mask
circlet.desc: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.
